per_frame_1=wzoom = 0.18*sin(time);
per_frame_2=q3=wzoom;
per_frame_3=q1 = 0.8 - 0.3*sin(-time*1.3);
per_frame_4=q2 = 0.8 - 0.3*cos(-time);
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=vol = 0.1*(vol*9 + (bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)*0.333333);
per_frame_7=q20 = vol;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=mtime = mtime+vol*0.05;
per_frame_10=rx = -0.5+0.3*sin(mtime*0.21);
per_frame_11=ry = -0.5+0.3*sin(mtime*0.14);
per_frame_12=q4=rx;
per_frame_13=q5=ry;
per_frame_14=monitor=q5;
per_frame_15=tx = 0.2*sin(mtime*0.24);
per_frame_16=ty = 0.2*sin(mtime*0.24);
per_frame_17=q6=tx;
per_frame_18=q7=ty;
per_frame_19=tr = 0.5 + 0.4*(0.6*sin(mtime*0.64) + 0.4*sin(mtime*0.32));
per_frame_20=tb = 0.5 + 0.4*(0.6*sin(-mtime*0.24) + 0.4*sin(mtime*0.72));
per_frame_21=tg = 0.5 + 0.4*(0.6*sin(mtime*0.42) + 0.4*cos(mtime*0.50));
per_frame_22=q11=tr;
per_frame_23=q12=tg;
per_frame_24=q13=rb;
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=bass_thresh = above(bass_att,bass_thresh)*2 + 
per_frame_27=    (1-above(bass_att,bass_thresh))*((bass_thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_28=count = equal(bass_thresh, 2)*1 + (1-equal(bass_thresh, 2))*count;
per_frame_29=count = count - above(count, 0.02)*0.02;
per_frame_30=q10=count;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_grad16;
warp_2=`
warp_3=`float2 cmul(float2 mul1, float2 mul2) {
warp_4=`  float2 mul = float2(mul1.x*mul2.x - mul1.y*mul2.y, mul1.y*mul2.x + mul1.x*mul2.y);
warp_5=`  return mul;
warp_6=`}
warp_7=`float2 cdiv(float2 div1, float2 div2) {
warp_8=`  float2 div = float2( (div1.x*div2.x + div1.y*div2.y)/(div2.x*div2.x + div2.y*div2.y),
warp_9=`  (div1.y*div2.x + div1.x*div2.y)/(div2.x*div2.x + div2.y*div2.y) );
warp_10=`  return div;
warp_11=`}
warp_12=`float2 cpow(float2 base, float ex) {
warp_13=`   float moduz = sqrt(base.x*base.x + base.y*base.y);
warp_14=`   float thetaz = atan2(base.y, base.x);
warp_15=`   float2 pow = float2(pow(moduz, ex)*cos(thetaz*ex), pow(moduz, ex)*sin(thetaz*ex));
warp_16=`   return pow;
warp_17=` }
warp_18=` float2 cexp(float2 base, float2 ex) {
warp_19=`   float moduz = sqrt(base.x*base.x + base.y*base.y);
warp_20=`   float thetaz = atan2(base.y, base.x);
warp_21=`   float mp = pow(moduz, ex.x)*exp(-ex.y*thetaz);
warp_22=`   float2 sol = mp*float2(cos(ex.y*log(moduz) + ex.x*thetaz), sin(ex.y*log(moduz) + ex.x*thetaz));
warp_23=`   return sol;
warp_24=` }
warp_25=`
warp_26=`shader_body 
warp_27=`{ 
warp_28=`// F(Z) = (Z+Z)^-4 + C
warp_29=`    float2 zoom = lerp(1,1,q20);
warp_30=`    float2 c = float2(q4, q5);
warp_31=`    //float2 c = float2(0.4, 0.3);
warp_32=`
warp_33=`    float2 uv1 = (float2(uv.x-0.5, uv.y-0.5))*zoom;
warp_34=`
warp_35=`    int n = 0;
warp_36=`    
warp_37=`    for(n=0; n<4; n++) {
warp_38=`      float2 tmp = uv1 + uv1;
warp_39=`      uv1 = cpow(tmp,-4) + c;
warp_40=`    }
warp_41=`
warp_42=`    float domain = dot(uv1,uv1);
warp_43=`    ret = lerp(float3(1-q11, 1-q12, 1-q13), ret, saturate(domain-2));
warp_44=`    ret = lerp(float3(0,0,0), ret, saturate(domain-1));
warp_45=`    float3 reta = tex2D(sampler_grad16, uv1); 
warp_46=`    ret += reta;
warp_47=`}
warp_48=` 
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`float3 reta = tex2D(sampler_main, uv);
comp_4=`ret = reta;
comp_5=`ret*=1;
comp_6=`
comp_7=`}
